verses.1: Kumpi Darias in a uk a kum lina, a kha kuana Khislev kha a ni li ni-in Topa in Zekhariah tungah thu gen hi.
verses.2: Bethel khua mite in, Topaʼ tung panin thupha a ngen ding le Vanglian Topaʼ biakinn sunga a om siampite le kamsangte tungah, “A beisa kum tampi sung ka hih sa uh mah bangin biakinn siatna hangin kapkap lai-in, kha ngana sungin an na tangtang lai ding ka hi uh hiam?” ci-in a dong dingin Sharezer le Regemmelek le a mite uh na sawl uh hi.
verses.4: Tua ahih ciangin Topa in kei tungah thu hong gen a,
verses.5: “Gam sung mi khempeuh le siampite tungah hih bangin gen in: Amaute in a beisa kum sawm sagih sung kha ngana le kha sagihna sungin an tangin a kahna uh, kei hong pahtawina uh hi lo hi.
verses.6: A annek a tuidawnte uh zong, amauʼ duh man bek ahi hi,” hong ci hi.
verses.7: Jerusalem cithei-in a khua sungah mi tampi om a, leitaw lam gam, nitumna lam gam, a kiim a pam khuapite ah mi tampi teengin a om hun laitakin, tu-a bangmahin Topa in a kamsang masateʼ tungtawnin a gen sa thu ahi hi.
verses.8: Topa in Zekhariah tungah thu gen a,
verses.9: “Note in thu a tangin khenin, khatlekhat tungah itna le hehpihna kilakin,
verses.10: note lakah a om meigong, tagah, gamdang mite, ahih kei leh mizawngte gim pia loin, khatlekhat kiliatsakna ding na ngaihsut loh nading uh thu ka hong pia zo hi,” a ci hi.
verses.11: Ahi zongin amaute in mang nuam het lo uh a, hih thute ngaihsutin zong nei nuam lo uh hi.
verses.12: Amaute in a lungsim uh suangtum bangin saksak uh a, Vanglian Topa in tanglai kamsangteʼ tungtawnin a gen thuhilhnate ngai nuam lo uh hi. Tua ahih manin Topa heh mahmah hi.
verses.13: Amaute ka hopih ciangin hong ngai nuam lo uh hi; kei zong amauteʼ hong thungetna ka ngai kei ding hi, Vanglian Topa in ci hi.
verses.14: Tua ahih manin Topa in, “Huihpiʼ mutkhiat bangin amaute thehthang gawpin, a theih ngei nai lohna uh gam dangah amaute teeng ding uh hi. Amauʼ nusiat leitang hoih zong gamkhing suak dinga, a tungah kuamah om nawn loin daicip ding hi,” a ci hi.
